abilities.name: Float
abilities.description: The aberration cannot be forced to cease its flight except by negating its innate magical nature, such as with an anti-magic field.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Eye Ray
actions.description:
Ranged Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, range 150ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d8 + the spell's level psychic damage

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: The aberration regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn, as long as it has at least one hit point.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Claws
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d10 + 3 + the spell's level slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the aberration's next turn

abilities.name: Whispering Aura
abilities.description: At the start of each of the aberration's turns (provided the aberration is conscious), each creature within 5 feet of the aberration must make a Will saving throw against your spell save DC or take 2d6 Psychic damage

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Psychic Slam
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level psychic damage

abilities.name: Flyby
abilities.description: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Maul
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell modifier to hit, reach 5t., one target.
On Hit: 1d8+4+ the spells level piercing or slashing damage (your choice when you summon the creature).

abilities.name: Pack Tactics
abilities.description: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated

actions.name: Multi-attack

abilities.name: Healing Touch
abilities.description: Once per summon, the celestial can touch another creature causing it to regain hit points equal to 2d8 + the spell's level

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The celestial makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Radiant Mace

Melee Attack: your spell modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d10 + 3 + the spells level radiant damage, and the celestial can choose a friendly creature within range of the target to gain the amount dealt in temporary hit points.

abilities.name: Berserk Lashing
abilities.description: When the construct takes damage, it can spend its reaction to make a slam attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If there is no creature within reach, it can move up to half its speed towards an enemy it can see without provoking attacks of opportunity.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The construct makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Slam
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d8 + 4 + the spells level Bludgeoning damage.

abilities.name: Heated Body
abilities.description: Any creature that touches the construct or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 1d10 Fire damage.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The construct makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Slam
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d8 + 4 + the spells level Bludgeoning damage.

abilities.name: Stony Lethargy
abilities.description: When a creature the construct can see starts its turn within 10 feet, the construct can force it to make a Will saving throw against your Spell Save DC. On a failed save, the target can't use reactions and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

abilities.name: Fey Step
abilities.description: As an action, the fey can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see. Then, it has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its turn.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Fey Blade
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d6 + 1 + the spells level Slashing damage and 1d6 Arcane damage.

abilities.name: Fey Step
abilities.description: As an action, the fey can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see. Then, it can force one creature that it can see within 10 feet to make a Will saving throw against your Spell Save DC. On a failed save, the target is Charmed by you for 1 minute or until it takes damage.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Fey Blade
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d6 + 1 + the spells level Slashing damage and 1d6 Arcane damage.

abilities.name: Fey Step
abilities.description: As an action, the fey can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see. Then, the fey can cause one 5-foot cube within reach to be filled with magical darkness until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Fey Blade
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d6 + 1 + the spells level Slashing damage and 1d6 Arcane damage.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.description: The fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Death Throes
abilities.description: When the fiend drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends, the fiend explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a Reflex saving throw against your Spell Save DC/ A creature takes 2d10 + this spells level in Fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Bite
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d12 + 3 + the spells level Dark damage.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance
abilities.description: The fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Devil's Sight
abilities.description: Your vision is not impeded by magical Darkness or other illusory effects.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Hurl Abyssal Flame
actions.description:
Ranged Attack: your spell modifier to hit, range 150ft, one target.
On Hit: 2d6 + the spells level Dark damage.

abilities.name: Incorporeal Passage
abilities.description: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 Arcane damage for every 5 feet traveled.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The undead makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Deathly Touch
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spells level Dark damage, and the creature must succeed a Will saving throw against your Spell Save DC or be frightened of the undead until the end of its next turn.

abilities.name: Festering Aura
abilities.description: Any creature other than you that starts its turn within 5 feet of the undead must succeed on a Fortitude saving throw against your Spell Save DC or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The undead makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Rotting Claw
actions.description:
Melee Attack: your spell modifier to hit, reach 5ft, one target.
On Hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spells level Dark damage, if the target is poisoned: it must succeed on a Fortitude saving throw against your Spell Save DC or be Paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

abilities.name: Dry Bones
abilities.description: The skeletal spirit is resistant to Slashing and Piercing damage, but vulnerable to Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multi-attack
actions.description: The undead makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Grave Bolt
actions.description:
Ranged Attack: your spell modifier to hit, range 150ft, one target.
On Hit: 2d4 + the spells level Dark damage.
